title: Curriculum Vitae: A Volume of Autobiography
author: Spark, Muriel
snippet: My addiction to the telephone started at this time; I was always calling home to my family, or they calling me. For a while I was sent by the Foreign Office – 'Seconded' was the word – to the US War Information Service in Inveresk House in London. This was pleasant, but now in a stage of winding up.
